45c22bd3ae9801e706089fcfaaa45d8721786a44.query: SELECT id, name, time_cutoff_seconds, upvote_threshold FROM subreddits

4660e7fd1aad34b7e94c29e82ef7c1636b6fcabf.query: INSERT INTO subreddits(name, upvote_threshold, time_cutoff_seconds) VALUES (?,?,?)

6689395d25e80d9e2e80d5eec70a0e6f9ed016ce.query:
INSERT INTO posts(reddit_id, subreddit, kind, title, url, permalink, created, ups)
                         VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

710c6340b826847d2723d27333ee791ca6753783.query: UPDATE posts SET ups = ?, threshold_passed = ? WHERE reddit_id = ? AND subreddit = ?

ac0cd0d20a1873edd63c2adcae4ae0dd878caff8.query: SELECT ups FROM posts WHERE reddit_id=?

f71a494f67f413ade7e1fd37394317c531692196.query:
SELECT p.title, p.url, p.threshold_passed
          FROM subreddits s
          LEFT JOIN posts p ON p.subreddit = s.id
          WHERE s.name = ? AND p.threshold_passed IS NOT NULL
          ORDER BY p.threshold_passed DESC
          LIMIT 50
